description.@en: Shimmering arrows lance outward towards the nearest foe.

criticalFailure.@en: The dancing arrows shoot off into the air, all but one misses and that one returns to strike you. You suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage and drop whatever is in your hands just outside of easy reach.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Resist this Magick.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes equal to your [WB]. Providing you can see your foes, each foe suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage. In addition, if your foes fail to Resist with a Coordination Test, they drop whatever is in their hands just outside of easy reach.

reagents.@en: A number of silver arrowheads equal to your [WB] (expended)
